item.description:
For 24 years, BCNC has hosted the Oak Street Fair with a simple goal: to bring children and families together for a fun day. The fair has grown bigger every year featuring games and activities, community resources and information, arts and crafts, entertainment, health screening and education, food and the famous watermelon eating contest! Last year, over 50 social, community, cultural, health, financial and educational organizations participated at the Oak Street Fair. it will be 11:00am - 3:00pm.

To be a sponsor or host a community non-profit table, fill out this form by August 28th. http://bcnc.net/image...
For more information, contact Joann Yung at joann.yung@bcnc.net.

Hope to see you there!

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: 24th Annual Oak Street Fair
